alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:53PM EDT until July 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Schenectady County in east central New York... Schoharie County in east central New York... South central Montgomery County in eastern New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Worcester, or 12 miles southeast of Cooperstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Jefferson, Middleburgh, Summit, Schoharie, Richmondville, Sharon Springs, Delanson, Livingstonville, Breakabeen, Central Bridge, Carlisle, Sharon, Seward, Esperance, Zeh Corners, Beekman Corners, West Richmondville, Baird Corners and Rockwell Corners. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
